title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 85 - Medical Assistance Benefits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 85 - Medical Assistance Benefits

State Regulations

Limitations on Hospitalization, Including Surgery (§ 85.1 to 85.4)

Limitation on Hospital Stay (§ 85.5 to 85.12)

Physically Handicapped Children (§ 85.13)

Continuing Stay Reviews in Residential Health Care Facilities (§ 85.14 to 85.17)

Nonprescription Drugs in the Medicaid Program (§ 85.20 to 85.25)

Outpatient Psychiatric Care (§ 85.28 to 85.36)

Prior Approval for Care and Services (§ 85.37 to 85.39)

Prenatal Care Services (§ 85.40 to 85.48)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 85

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§ 21, 201, 206, 576, 2164, 2500-a, 2522[6], 2528, 2803, 2904, 2904-b, 3612 [6], 4175; Social

Services Law, §§ 363-a, 364[2], 365-a, 365-a[4]; Education Law, §
6816[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
